title: please help me....
body:
Please Riot help me...
my shop is not opening...
every time i click on shop it shows that the session is expired and relogin into the game, or contact riot..
pls guys help me...i want to buy new champion but shop is not responding
{{champion:268}}

replies.body:
The store session expired error can be caused by a number of factors. Most of the solutions can be found in our [Store issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202536660) and are fairly simple to perform.

Let me know if those steps worked for ya.
